mainText:
Somehow I suspected it wouldn't be too much longer before Steve left us. 
 Even knowing this, I still can't help but feel as if a large part of my 
life has just left.  Even though I didn't, and probably never would have 
had a chance to know him personally, I can't help but look around my 
home and office and know how much he has influenced a large part of my 
life and business.

My condolences go out to his family, friends and his adopted family 
members that he worked with closely on a day to day basis.

Steve, you will be sorely missed but remembered for many lifetimes to 
come.
author: Ken
